activities: Travelzoo Inc. receives personal information from the EU as a result of operations related to its website and email newsletters. The personal information Travelzoo Inc. collects enables it to provide personalized content to users of the website and email newsletters. Personal information is also collected to facilitate hotel bookings and the sale of vouchers for use at local businesses.
contactoff1: Travelzoo Inc., 800 W. El Camino Real, Suite 275, Mountain View, CA 94040
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: In-house and TRUSTe - please see the above privacy
personaldata: off-line, on-line, human resources data and manually processed data
recoursemech: For EU or Swiss human resources data: EU data protection authorities (EU DPAs) or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: TRUSTe
